TrainingDetails.Title: Content
TrainingDetails.Abstract: This is a general page type. This is used to display images and information. The optional side column can be either on the left or right side of the body area, or you can leave the column off.
TrainingDetails.BodyCopy:
Required Information:

You need to know how to upload photos into the Ingeniux CMS

Required Elements on this page(These elements are needed to save the page):

  • Title
  • Abstract

Title

Here you need to enter the title of the site. It will be placed in the header of the page.

Abstract

A summary of the site

Image Column


Toggle Left or Right

If this is uncheck if will put the image on the left side. If it is check it will be on the right side.

Images

You need to upload an image prior to this step.
You will be replacing the image that was placed in as a default.
Maximum image size is:
Width: 159px
Height: 188px
1. Click on browse on the right of the box.
2. Find your image within the structure
3. Click ok
4. Add alt text in the box provided. This text should be descriptive of the image you are adding to the page.

Body Copy

 

This is where your site will go.

Related Links


The organization you work for should also have its won related links section. You will need to choose that one.

SEO Group

Browser Bar

Title of the page that will go in the browser bar
No Follow
Search engines will not index the links on this page.
No Index
Search engines will not index the links on this page AND this page will not be either.
NO ODP
This page will not be indexed by the ODP search engine. Please see this link for more information about ODP.
Priority
Please do not adjust this setting

Site Control


You will need to choose the site control that is related to your department. This will also allow your page to display correctly. This element creates the navigation menu on the left.
